mapper.select: select * from user JOIN dept ON user.dept_id = dept.dept_id join pos on user.pos_id = pos.pos_id join duty on user.duty_id = duty.duty_id where user.dept_id like CONCAT(#{deptId},'%');
mapper.insert: insert into manager(manager_id, approval_target) select a.user_id, b.user_id from user a right join user b on a.dept_id=b.dept_id where a.authority_code="A2";
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, head as 본부, depart as 부서, team as 팀, duty_name from usersdetail where user_id=#{managerId};

select user_id, user_password, code_name as authority_code from user left join code_info on authority_code = common_code where current_state = '재직' and user_id = #{userId} and user_password = #{userPwd}
select user_name, duty_name, user_id from usersdetail where authority_code="A3"
select manager_id from tempmanagerinfo where temp_manager=#{userId};
